text:
If new issues are added, please assign new issue the next consecutive number 
larger than latest reported issue.

1) Update source files to Apache 2.0 license header.
2) Change jakarta references in INSTALL.txt to appropriate logging references.
3) docs dir in release images should be referring to 1.2.11 instead of 1.2.9.
4) Give docs dir a thorough once over to make sure all is valid.
5) Release image has lots of confusing empty dirs.
6) Tar error when untarring.
7) Verify jms bug fix (#34491).
8) Run release image against test cases on jdk 1.1, 1.2, 1.3, and 1.4.
creator: mwomack@apache.org
mwomack@apache.org
text:
Issue #1 - Existing headers replaced, but some .java files don't have any 
existing header.  Will add before rc2.

Issue #2 - Fix checked in, will be in rc2.

Issue #5 - Fixed in rc1.

Issue #6 - Build environment updated to Ant 1.6.4, will be in rc2.
BTW, #5 was fixed by using the "prune empty dirs" cvs checkout option.
creator: mwomack@apache.org

text: Issue #7 - Verified by Andy McBride.  Thanks, Andy.
creator: mwomack@apache.org
mwomack@apache.org
text:
Issue #1 - Added license header to .java files that did not already have the 
license.  Resolved, will be in rc2.

Issue #3 - Updated download.xml to talk about 1.2.11 instead of 1.2.9.

Issue #4 - Updated various pages to remove links to the non-existent (at least 
in the 1.2 branch) chainsaw.xml/.html.
creator: mwomack@apache.org

text:
re: 4) Give docs dir a thorough once over to make sure all is valid.

Mark, if you can generate the docs and put them up somewhere, I could give them
a review?
creator: psmith@apache.org
mwomack@apache.org
text:
Issue #8 - Successfully ran all unit tests in jdk 1.3 with Ant 1.6.4 and jUnit 
3.8.1.  Had to modify the witness files to match the taskdef stack trace for 
the junit task in Ant 1.6.4.  Running tests under jdk 1.1 and 1.2 is 
problematic, and running the tests under 1.4 will fail due to different stack 
trace patterns related to the reflection implementation.  I think this is as 
good as it gets for this release.
Issue #4 - Updated docs to reflect future release roadmap.
creator: mwomack@apache.org
